briefTitle: Lymphedema Severity on Shoulder Joint Function and Muscle Activation Patterns in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: The Impact of Lymphedema Severity on Shoulder Joint Function and Muscle Activation Patterns in Breast Cancer Survivors: A Cross-Sectional Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female
* Adults (18 years or older)
* Diagnosis of breast cancer-related lymphedema for a minimum of 3 months
* No current evidence of active cancer
* Able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pre-existing musculoskeletal conditions affecting the upper extremities (e.g. adhesive capsulitis, rotator cuff tear)
* Previous upper extremity surgery
* Physical inability to perform the required physical movements and assessments
